"Slag it, I hate decisions like this," Wheeljack mutters.  Thinking 
quickly, he dashes to the mess hall, puts several energon versions of 
sliced peppers and onions on a skewer, then races back to Blackfang's 
side with the snack.  "Wheeljack to Rodimus.  Sorry to bother you, but 
I've got an order of well-done logic circuits with a side of 
vegetables to bring to your attention."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> A sudden whizz and a thin plume of smoke rise from behind 
Blackfang's 
> head and he is locked in place, seemingly frozen.
> 
> The med-scanner's report is grim. Many of the bot's logic circuits 
are 
> damaged beyond repair, but still operate. In short, it has driven 
him 
> from being the valiant black knight to the dark stalker.
> 
> Replacing the circuits would be possible, but very jeopardizing for 
> Blackfang's spark. That is the one intact part inside him.
> 
> OOC: Trying to replace the circuits will only kill him.
